BODY.Build: Glass front (Gorilla Glass Victus 2), glass back (Gorilla Glass), aluminum frame
BODY.SIM: Single SIM (Nano-SIM) or Dual SIM (2x Nano-SIM, eSIM, dual stand-by) or Dual SIM (2x Nano-SIM, dual stand-by)

DISPLAY.Type: LTPO AMOLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, Dolby Vision, HDR10+, 600 nits (typ), 1600 nits (HBM), 4500 nits (peak)

PLATFORM.CPU: Octa-core (1x3.3 GHz Cortex-X4 & 3x3.2 GHz Cortex-A720 & 2x3.0 GHz Cortex-A720 & 2x2.3 GHz Cortex-A520)

MAIN CAMERA.Triple:
50 MP, f/1.6, 23mm (wide), 1/1.43", 1.12µm, multi-directional PDAF, OIS
64 MP, f/2.6, 70mm (periscope telephoto), 1/2.0", 0.7µm, PDAF, OIS, 3x optical zoom
48 MP, f/2.2, 14mm, 114˚ (ultrawide), 1/2.0", 0.8µm, PDAF
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Hasselblad Color Calibration, Dual-LED flash, HDR, panorama

COMMS.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS (G1), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a), GALILEO (E1+E5a), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, color spectrum

BATTERY.Charging:
100W wired, PD, QC, 1-100% in 26 min (International)
80W wired, PD, QC, 1-100% in 30 min (USA)
50W wireless, 1-100% in 55 min (advertised)
10W reverse wireless

MISC.Colors: Flowy Emerald, Silky Black, Silver (Glacial White)
